job_tasks.phrase: verder ontwikkelen en vormgeven van ons Drupal CMS
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the ongoing development and shaping of a content management system (Drupal CMS), which is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: vertaalt samen met het team een functionele behoefte naar een passende oplossing binnen het Drupal CMS
job_tasks.justification: Translating functional needs into technical solutions within a CMS is a fundamental software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: een stuk maatwerk implementeren met PHP
job_tasks.justification: Implementing custom features using a programming language (PHP) is a direct software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: meewerkt aan de front-end in javascript
job_tasks.justification: Working on the front-end using JavaScript is a standard software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: een externe koppeling moet opzetten en inrichten
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and configuring external integrations is a common software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: beheer je ook het platform waar Drupal op draait, waarbij je bezig bent met de backend van het systeem
job_tasks.justification: Managing the platform and working on the backend of the system are core software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met Marketing & Communicatie vertaal je wensen naar hoogwaardige oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: Translating business/marketing wishes into technical solutions is a software development task, often involving understanding business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: zorg je voor een goed beheersbaar platform
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring a well-manageable platform is part of maintaining and developing the software system.

job_tasks.phrase: hard aan verbeteringen van de website, waaronder de presentatie van onze opleidingen en minoren
job_tasks.justification: Working on improvements to the website, specifically presentation aspects, is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: doorontwikkeling van de UX, homepage, menu en zoekfunctionaliteit
job_tasks.justification: Further developing user experience, homepage, menu, and search functionality are all software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: onderzoeken we hoe generatieve AI onze redacteuren kan ondersteunen
job_tasks.justification: Investigating how generative AI can support editors falls under exploring AI capabilities, which is related to model application or research and experimentation.

soft_skills.phrase: samen met je collega ontwikkelaars en met collega's binnen team Applications
nauw samenwerken met zowel collega ontwikkelaars als de product owner en functioneel beheerders
werk je aan je eigen ontwikkeling
te groeien naar een functie waarin je collega's ondersteunt
samen te werken met verschillende disciplines binnen een complexe organisatie

profile.rationale: The job advertisement primarily focuses on traditional software development tasks related to PHP and Drupal CMS. While there is a mention of exploring generative AI's potential support for editors, this is framed as an investigation rather than a core responsibility. The technologies listed (PHP, Drupal, JavaScript) are standard web development tools, with no specific AI/ML frameworks or models mentioned. The role's responsibilities are overwhelmingly aligned with Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), with minimal to no engagement in Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization) tasks. This aligns with the definition of a Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed regarding the core responsibilities being traditional PHP/Drupal development. The mention of generative AI is minimal and exploratory, making the classification of the role as 'Software Engineer' unambiguous. The technologies and soft skills are also clearly stated.
